Name: Volcanic Fumaroles
Story Background: Volcanic Fumaroles are rugged and treacherous terrains where volcanic activity and raw elemental power converge. The searing heat, billowing smoke, and molten stone create a landscape of awe-inspiring danger and untamed power.
Ability: Volcanic Fumaroles enters the battlefield untapped and adds one red mana to your mana pool. You may tap Volcanic Fumaroles to deal 1 damage to target creature or player.
Appearance Description: Volcanic Fumaroles depicts a tumultuous vista of smoldering vents, craggy rocks, and rivers of molten lava. The land is enveloped in fiery hues of red and orange, pulsating with primal, destructive energy, and emanating an ominous, billowing smoke.
